My sister! Have you seen my sister?

She ran off into the forest. We...we had an argument. She always comes back when she's calmed down, but it's been two days already!

They say the forest isn't safe anymore, but you look brave. Can you find my sister {@LinkCreature:202#1028#Jerelyn}?
(It's a corpse. You notice that her necklace has broken, a small segment of the chain remains. There are muddy marks all over her.)

Jerelyn! Jerelyn! No!

I can't believe she isn't coming back...

It's all my fault...just a stupid, stupid argument...

I have a confession to make, . We were arguing over a necklace that we both coveted.

Could you get it back for me? I want to bury Jerelyn with it.

The least I can do is let her win our last argument.
